dialogue: You've got some nerve, calling me like nothing’s wrong.
Oh, god...I never thought you'd find out.

Yeah. Remember in second grade when you brought your pet turtle to school, and he went missing? That was because of me. I was convinced he was secretly one of the ninja turtles, so I sneaked him into the bathroom and...I flushed him.

I thought I was sending him home! I never told you, because I thought you wouldn't understand. It wasn't until years later that I realized what I’d done. I don’t know how you found out, but...I’m so sorry, Steve.
I had no idea! You...you flushed my turtle down the toilet??
What? Then what were you mad at me for?
I was just messing with you.
That's really fucked up, dude. You killed my turtle, and you’ve been hiding it from me for all these years??
Uh, no. I was just...I was just messing with you too!
Yeah, I was just going along with the joke. Ha! Ha, ha. Gotcha!
Uh huh! Yeah. Good one, right?
Anyway, I gotta go! Will talk to you later.
Part of me still wonders if Ralphie ever made it back to the other ninja turtles. He's probably not even a teenager any more.
